text: Rafael Moreno Lopez (born August 25, 1966 in Málaga) is a judo athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B2 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished 6 in the + 95 Kg group. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished second in the Open group. He competed at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in judo. He competed at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in judo. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Malaga Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Rafael Moreno López
